T02D1571:248a-1: badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D1571:248a-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1571:248a-4: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1571:248a-5: bde ba dam pa rgyun gyi rgyu //
T02D1571:248a-6: rdo rje phag mo la btud de //
T02D1571:248a-7: de yi sgrub thabs drag po ni //
T02D1571:248a-8: mdor bsdus pa ni brtsam par bya //
T02D1571:248a-9: mam las nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i: dkar po'i
T02D1571:248a-10: 'od zer thon nas rab tu gtum mo la sogs
T02D1571:248a-11: pa 'khor lo gsum gyi lha mo rnams dang /
T02D1571:248a-12: do rje phag mo la sogs pa yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1571:248a-13: ngo bo nyid kyi yang dag par mos pas stong
T02D1571:248a-14: pa nyid la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro bas padma
T02D1571:248a-15: dmar po'i steng du mam las byung ba'i nyi ma
T02D1571:248a-16: la h'um dkar po las skyes pa'i rdo rje dkar
T02D1571:248b-0: po rtse @248b lnga pa las skyes pa'i rdo rje
T02D1571:248b-1: phag mo spyan gsum dmar ba /
T02D1571:248b-4: rdo rje phreng ba gnyis kyi bar du thong ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa /
T02D1571:248b-5: phyag rgya lngas rgyas btab pa /
T02D1571:248b-6: phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D1571:248b-7: g-yon na thod pa dang kha t'am gang snams [*snam?] pa //
T02D1571:248b-9: gcer bu lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams 'jags par mdzad pa //
T02D1571:248b-10: 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'phro ba'i hr'i: nyi ma
T02D1571:248b-11: la gnas pas snying gar byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo
T02D1571:248b-12: rje phag mor bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1571:248b-13: rang gi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi
T02D1571:248b-14: 'khor lo bkug ste de cho ga bzhin du bcug
T02D1571:248b-15: ste / aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1571:248b-16: de'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1571:248b-17: bkug nas gnas dbang bskyur bas spyi bor mi bskyod
T02D1571:248b-19: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pas bdag nyid la mchod nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya ste /
T02D1571:248b-20: lte bar sna tshogs padma la nyi ma dmar ba
T02D1571:248b-21: la hr'i: dkar po phreng ba'i rnam pa lta bur
T02D1571:248b-22: sngags kyi phreng ba dkar po kha nas 'thon nas
T02D1571:248b-23: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la sogs pa blangs te
T02D1571:248b-24: / lte ba'i bu gar zhugs pa las bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1571:248b-25: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1571:248b-26: langs nas de'i gzugs kyis rgyun du bya'o //
T02D1571:248b-27: thun mtshams gzhan yang de bzhin bya'o //
T02D1571:248b-28: aa las gyur pa'i lce padma'i rnam pa la yi
T02D1571:248b-29: ge h'um 'phros pas ji srid 'dod kyi bar du
T02D1571:248b-30: thun bzhir sngags zlos pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o
T02D1571:248b-31: // de ltar bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing rtsod pa chen por 'gyur ro ;
T02D1571:248b-32: / dug la sogs bdud rtsir 'gyur ro //
T02D1571:248b-33: dbang du byas pa la sogs pa de'i sa bon
T02D1571:248b-34: dmar po dang kha dog dmar pos sngon bzhin du
T02D1571:248b-35: bya'o // rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo gtso //
T02D1571:248b-36: rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1571:248b-37: byas las dge ba gang thob pa //
T02D1571:248b-38: des ni bdag dang sems can rnams //
T02D1571:248b-39: dus yun ring la mi ltos par //
T02D1571:248b-40: bla med byang chub rgyal gyur cig / rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs //
T02D1571:248b-41: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1571:248b-43: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti k'irti dang /
T02D1571:248b-44: bod kyi lo ts'a ba mkhas pa chen por mar
T02D1571:249a-0: pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing @249a *
